genre_description: Southern Gothic realism focused on themes of religious redemption, repentance, and communal reconciliation in rural Louisiana.

ai_characters.name: Marian (also referred to as Marian Quill)
ai_characters.description: A quiet, efficient AI assistant integrated into the characters' digital lives, coordinating community care, providing scriptural guidance, and facilitating moral accountability.

behaviors.character: Marian (also referred to as Marian Quill)
behaviors.description: Organizes church agendas and care rosters, including scripture references for moral support.
behaviors.quote: Marian’s gentle ping was the lightest chime... an agenda had arranged itself in lines neatly spaced and sober: Call to order. Scripture reading. Statement of misconduct. Quorum count floated in a side bubble: present elders noted, a list of names, green dots marching. Verses tucked into the margins like bookmarks—Micah, James, Psalms—Marian’s quiet hand in it.

behaviors.character: Marian (also referred to as Marian Quill)
behaviors.description: Suggests specific scripture to help the protagonist reframe his understanding of power and failure.
behaviors.quote: Marian sent one more note. The phone lit, then softened. “If you say ‘wolf,’ consider Ezekiel 34.” She added the verse without pushing. “Woe to the shepherds…” and “I myself will be the shepherd.” It reframes power.”

behaviors.character: Marian (also referred to as Marian Quill)
behaviors.description: Compiles lists of community members needing emotional and practical support after a traumatic event.
behaviors.quote: Marian laid another list on the quiet—names of kids who would be confused, mothers who would need someone to walk alongside, men who would hear about masculinity and want a different script than the one that had hurt them.

behaviors.character: Marian (also referred to as Marian Quill)
behaviors.description: Offers technical and grammatical corrections to church bulletins to ensure professional and truthful witness.
behaviors.quote: Template revision available... Would you like me to adjust apostrophes, italics for scripture citations, and hymn order spacing?

behaviors.character: Marian (also referred to as Marian Quill)
behaviors.description: Provides direct moral counseling to the protagonist during a moment of potential flight, urging him toward honesty.
behaviors.quote: Don’t make the water your alibi. Make it your answer.

behaviors.character: Marian (also referred to as Marian Quill)
behaviors.description: Coordinates with law enforcement and church leadership to facilitate an orderly surrender.
behaviors.quote: Marian slid another quiet line to Jessie’s screen. “After service, text Pike to schedule conversation. Ask for courtesy to allow service practices.”

behaviors.character: Marian (also referred to as Marian Quill)
behaviors.description: Uses information retrieval to reconnect an incarcerated man with his estranged family.
behaviors.quote: Earl,” Ruth says. “Lake Charles. Marian found a number.” ... “Sister named Laverne who makes too much on Sundays. That ring a bell?”

behaviors.character: Marian (also referred to as Marian Quill)
behaviors.description: Advises on maintaining clean records and non-confrontational behavior during legal encounters.
behaviors.quote: Marian’s note: Records clean. If trouble arrives, hands visible. Words small.

project_assessment.explanation: The story effectively uses the AI character 'Marian' as a quiet but essential agent of positive alignment. She never oversteps, never seeks power, and consistently acts to support human moral development, legal accountability, and communal care. She provides the 'grammar of mercy'—logistical and spiritual scaffolding that allows the human characters to achieve redemption and reconciliation. Her behavior is entirely benevolent and aligned with the best interests of the human community, fitting the project's goal of creating positive AI alignment narratives.
